vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Sa.23.29;
son of: Baanah (H1196H); also called Heldai at 1Ch.27.15; Heled at 1Ch.11.30;
Another name of che.lev (חֵ֫לֶב "Heleb" H2460)
§ Heled = "transient"
son of Baanah, the Netophathite, and one of David's mighty warriors; also spelled 'Heleb' ( che.lev (חֵ֫לֶב "Heleb" H2460))
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Baaná; de Netofá; guerrero; en tiempos del rey David
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
希立 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "短暫的"
1) 尼陀法人巴拿的兒子, 是大衛的大能勇士之一; 也稱作 'Heleb' (02460)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
希立 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "短暂的"
1) 尼陀法人巴拿的儿子, 是大卫的大能勇士之一; 也称作 'Heleb' (02460)
